item.title: Paper Summay on Aligning LLM with Self Generated Instructions
item.description: The paper “Self-Instruct: Aligning Language Model with Self Generated Instructions” introduces a framework called Self-Instruct for improving the instruction-following capabilities of pretrained language models by bootstrapping off its own generations.

item.title: Trading Strategy
item.description: The indicators of price actions are more critical to the interprete the micro-market.

item.title: Recall-Oriented Understudy for Gisting Evaluation (ROUGE)
item.description: Introduction Recall-Oriented Understudy for Gisting Evaluation (ROUGE) is a set of evaluation metrics used to measure the quality of automatic summarization and machine translation outputs.

item.title: Cluster-Based Local Outlier Factor
item.description: Cluster-Based Local Outlier Factor (CBLOF) is an unsupervised anomaly detection algorithm that identifies outliers in a dataset by taking into account the local density of points.
